text:
Before The Trailer Of Uri, Vicky Kaushal Gives Us Yet Another Glimpse Of The Intense Story
Before The Trailer Of Uri, Vicky Kaushal Gives Us Yet Another Glimpse Of The Intense Story
Vicky Kaushal has royally owned this year. With back to back hits and amazing performances, he has established a firm foot in the industry. He is in demand and every filmmaker dreams of working with him.
Screengrab
The actor is currently promoting his upcoming film Uri. The film is based on the Indian Army's surgical strikes on terror launch pads across the Line of Control (LoC). On September 18, 2016, 19 Indian soldiers were killed in an early morning attack by Pakistani terrorists at the 12 Infantry Brigade headquarters in Uri.
Screengrab
Vicky managed to create a strong buzz about the film after he unveiled the teaser of the film.
Screengrab
Don't Miss 233 SHARES 870 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES
Vicky Kaushal took to his social media accounts to share the deets. He wrote, "Watch the story behind the surgical strike unfold. #URItrailer out on 5th December. @yamigautam @SirPareshRawal @AdityaDharFilms @RonnieScrewvala @RSVPMovies."
A few days ago, he had shared a video of him dubbing for the film.
title: Before The Trailer Of Uri, Vicky Kaushal Gives Us Yet Another Glimpse Of The Intense Story
description: The actor is currently promoting his upcoming film Uri. The film is based on the Indian Army's surgical strikes on terror launch pads across the Line of Control (LoC). On September 18, 2016, 19 Indian soldiers were killed in an early morning attack by Pakistani terrorists at the 12 Infantry Brigade headquarters in Uri.
